mapper.insert: INSERT INTO loan_product(lpdName, lsubTitle, lcontent, lgrade, lmaxPeriod, lmaxPrice, lrate, ltype, lcxlRate) VALUES(#{lpdName}, #{lsubTitle}, #{lcontent}, #{lgrade}, #{lmaxPeriod}, #{lmaxPrice}, #{lrate}, #{ltype}, #{lcxlRate})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM loan_product WHERE lPdName LIKE '%'||#{lpdName}||'%' AND show='y'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO loan_req_tbl(lReqNum, lPdName, id, lPrincipal, lPeriod, lPurpose, lIncome, lState, lReqDate, acPwd, lReason) VALUES((SELECT NVL(MAX(lReqNum)+1, 1) FROM loan_req_tbl), #{lpdName}, #{id}, #{lprincipal}*10000, #{lperiod}, #{lpurpose}, #{lincome}, '승인전', sysdate, #{acPwd}, '승인전')
mapper.select: SELECT r.lReqNum, r.lPdName, r.lPrincipal, l.lRate, r.lReqDate, r.lState, r.lReason FROM loan_req_tbl r, loan_product l WHERE r.lPdName = l.lPdName AND r.id = #{id} ORDER BY r.lReqDate DESC

SELECT r.lReqNum, r.lPdName, r.lperiod, r.lPrincipal, l.lRate, r.lReqDate, r.lState, r.lReason, c.name, r.id FROM loan_req_tbl r, loan_product l, customer c WHERE r.lPdName = l.lPdName AND c.id = r.id ORDER BY r.lReqDate DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO account_tbl(acNumber, id, bankName, acState, acBalance, acType, acPwd, newDate, trsfLimit) VALUES( #{acNumber}, (SELECT id FROM loan_req_tbl WHERE lReqNum=#{lreqNum}), '돼지은행', 'OPEN', (SELECT lPrincipal FROM loan_req_tbl WHERE lReqNum=#{lreqNum}), '대출계좌', (SELECT acPwd FROM loan_req_tbl WHERE lReqNum=#{lreqNum}), SYSDATE, 10000000)

INSERT INTO l_account_tbl(lNum, acNumber, lStartDate, lEndDate, lReqNum) VALUES((SELECT NVL(MAX(lNum)+1, 1) FROM l_account_tbl), (SELECT acNumber FROM account_tbl WHERE id = (SELECT id FROM loan_req_tbl WHERE lReqNum = #{lreqNum}) AND acType='대출계좌' AND newDate = (SELECT MAX(newDATE) FROM account_tbl)), sysdate, (SELECT ADD_MONTHS(sysdate, (SELECT lPeriod FROM loan_req_tbl WHERE lReqNum = #{lreqNum})) FROM dual), #{lreqNum})
mapper.select: SELECT r.lPrincipal, p.lType, p.lRate, r.lPeriod FROM loan_req_tbl r, loan_product p WHERE r.lPdName = p.lPdName AND r.lReqNum = #{lreqNum}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO l_accountPay_tbl(lWillPayNum, lPayTurn, lNum, lMonTotal, lMonPrice, lMonRate) VALUES((SELECT NVL(MAX(lWillPayNum)+1, 1) FROM l_accountPay_tbl), #{lpayTurn}, (SELECT MAX(lNum) FROM l_account_tbl), #{lmonTotal}, #{lmonPrice}, #{lmonRate})
mapper.select: SELECT l.lStartDate, l.lEndDate, p.lType, p.lRate, p.lCxlRate, a.acBalance, p.lPdName FROM account_tbl a, l_account_tbl l, loan_req_tbl r, loan_product p WHERE a.acNumber = l.acNumber AND l.lreqNum = r.lreqNum AND r.lpdName = p.lpdName AND a.acNumber = #{acNumber}

SELECT d.lpaidNum, l.acNumber, p.lpayTurn, p.lmonRate, p.lmonPrice, p.lmonTotal, d.lpayDate FROM l_account_tbl l, l_accountPay_tbl p, l_detail_tbl d WHERE d.lwillPayNum = p.lwillPayNum AND p.lnum = l.lnum AND l.acNumber = #{acNumber}
SELECT * FROM l_accountPay_tbl WHERE lnum=#{lnum} AND lPayStatus='상환예정' ORDER BY lPayTurn
SELECT p.*, l.acNumber FROM l_accountPay_tbl p, l_account_tbl l WHERE p.lnum = l.lnum AND p.lWillPayNum=#{lwillPayNum}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO l_detail_tbl(lPaidNum, lWillPayNum, lPayDate) VALUES((SELECT NVL(MAX(lPaidNum)+1, 1) FROM l_detail_tbl), #{lwillPayNum}, sysdate)
mapper.update: INSERT INTO TRANSFER_TBL(tNum, acNumber, tDepositnum, tDepositBank, tType, tAmount, myMemo, yourMemo, tDate) VALUES((SELECT NVL(MAX(tNum) + 1, 1) FROM TRANSFER_TBL), #{acNumber}, (SELECT l.acNumber FROM l_account_tbl l, l_accountPay_tbl p WHERE l.lnum = p.lnum AND p.lWillPayNum = #{lwillPayNum}), '돼지은행', '출금', #{cancelFee} + #{acBalance}, '대출금상환', '대출금상환', sysdate)

UPDATE account_tbl SET acBalance = (acBalance - #{lmonTotal}) WHERE acNumber = ( SELECT l.acNumber FROM account_tbl a, l_account_tbl l, l_accountPay_tbl p WHERE a.acNumber = l.acNumber AND p.lNum = l.lNum AND p.lWillPayNum = #{lwillPayNum} )
mapper.select: SELECT p.lPdName, r.lPrincipal, r.lPeriod, p.lRate, p.lCxlRate, a.acNumber, a.acBalance, l.lStartDate, l.lEndDate FROM loan_product p, account_tbl a, l_account_tbl l, loan_req_tbl r WHERE l.lReqNum = r.lReqNum AND r.lPdName = p.lPdName AND l.acNumber = a.acNumber AND l.lNum = #{lnum}
mapper.update: INSERT INTO TRANSFER_TBL(tNum, acNumber, tDepositnum, tDepositBank, tType, tAmount, myMemo, yourMemo, tDate) VALUES((SELECT NVL(MAX(tNum) + 1, 1) FROM TRANSFER_TBL), #{acNumber}, (SELECT acNumber FROM l_account_tbl WHERE lnum = #{lnum}), '돼지은행', '출금', #{cancelFee} + #{acBalance}, '대출중도상환', '대출중도상환', sysdate)
UPDATE account_tbl SET acBalance = 0, acState = 'DELETE' WHERE acNumber = (SELECT acNumber FROM l_account_tbl WHERE lnum = #{lnum})
